list_definition.definition: to see, hear etc (a person, thing etc) and know who or what that person, thing etc is, because one has seen or heard him, it etc before

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I recognized him by his voice.

list_definition.definition: to be willing to have political relations with

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Many countries were unwilling to recognize the new republic.

list_definition.definition: to accept as valid, well-qualified etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I don’t recognize the authority of this court.
